strings.M500: [Language] - Metadata language is not defined and other language are declared and Main metadata language MUST NOT be defined in other language section.

alert.M500.div:
Check that the main metadata language is not defined and other languages (ie. gmd:locale) elements exist (see Advanced view / metadata section).
Suggestions: Define main metadata language or remove other language definition.

alert.M501.div:
Declare the main metadata language only once (see Advanced view / metadata section).
Suggestions: remove it from the other language section.

alert.emptyURL.div: Check that you don't have any empty URL (che:URLGroup or che:LocalisedURL)

alert.emptyText.div: Check that you don't have any empty text (gmd:textGroup or che:LocalisedCharacterString)

strings.report.emptyText: Localised text must not have empty content
